name: Harvest Survivors
description:
Credits
  • MUSIC/SFX: https://tallbeard.itch.io/three-red-hearts-prepare-to-dev
  • ART/PROGRAMMING/EVERYTHING: http://twitter.com/paigemarincak
Technical Stuff
  • ENGINE: GameMaker Studio 2
  • ART: Aseprite
How to Play
  • Use WASD or Arrow Key to move
  • Use the Left Mouse button to click on UI elements
  • Get rid of enemies, protect your crops (or harvest them!) and survive!
  • Note: Gamepad work for movement but not UI interaction.
 Other Notes
  • Unfortunately I was sick this weekend so I didn't get to spend as much time as I wanted on this. I hope you enjoy it nonetheless!
  • Total Dev Time: 20:55:08
  • It takes about 15 minutes to clear the game
  • Browser Version Available here: https://gx.games/games/m5vcor/harvest-survivors/
